translations.name: Montgomery New Testament
translations.description: The Montgomery New Testament (1924) by Helen Barrett Montgomery is the only modem speech translation of the New Testament into English from Greek produced by a woman. Helen Barrett Montgomery's translation is known for its conversational style with text arranged into a paragraph format. The translator was an American social reformer who, among other accomplishments, was the first female president of the Northern Baptist Convention. She was also the president of the women's American Baptist Foreign Mission Society from 1914 to 1924.
